content.description: White Line Fever is to the left of The Far Side and to the right of Barracuda.  Shares the same start as Razor's Edge but goes up and to the right to join The Far Side at the overlap (The Razor's Edge stays to the left and has it's own holds.)
content.protection: Top Rope.  Could easily do on lead using bolts for The Far Side.
content.location: Enchanted Rock.  Kingdom of Zilch. West face of Solo Boulder. Between Barracuda and The Far Side.

content.description:
Previously difficult even to TR and basically impossible to lead, this route was bolted in 2005 thereby allowing the many to experience what only the few had 

  Climb decent holds up low angel rock curving up and to the right, with a commiting step up and around the corner.
content.location: On the east corner of the South face of the solo boulder

content.description: Sustained steep face climbing past four bolts to a two bolt anchor.  Called the easiest and best 5.12 in the park.
content.location: Bolt line immediately left of "Solo" on the Solo boulder.  This route faces, and is thus easily viewed from, the parking lot

content.description: Route is between The Far Side and Barracuda.  There is a small crack at the base of the route.  The route runs parallel to The Far Side.  It crosses over the far left side of the crack below the bulge half-way up the wall.  It proceeds straight up from there until it comes to a sharp hold at the base of a dish about 5 ft above the overlap crack. It the moves up and to the left until it joins The Far Side at the last bolt.  Really a fun, hard route.  The move to the namesake hold of route is very powerful.  Then you must be very gentle in order to use the Razor's Edge and proceed up from there.
content.protection: Top Rope.  Theoretically you could do it on lead and use the same bolts as for far side but a big swing could occur if you fall.
content.location: In the Kingdom of Zilch.  On the Southwest face of the Solo Boulder to the right of Barracuda and to the left of The Far Side.

content.description: Kind of fun and thrilling due to the big air and exposure.  Route is on the Southwest arete of Solo Boulder.  Start by getting on top rope and swinging across the chasm.  Begin at the lowest point on the West side of the arete.  Follow the arete to the top.
content.protection: Top Rope. Use combo of bolts in the middle of the boulder and the anchor-bolts for The Far Side.  Extend the anchor as far down the arete as possible to minimize rope damage.
content.location: Southwest Arete of the Solo boulder in the Kingdom of Zilch.  To the right of The Far Side.

content.description: Thin granite face climb. Big drop off under the first bolt. Don't blow the first moves!
content.protection: 4 bolts and 2 anchors at the top.
content.location: Rightmost route on the west face of Solo Boulder. Scramble up the squeeze chimney to get to the top of acid boulder and belay from the top of acid boulder across the chasm.

content.protection: 5 bolts with 2 anchors at the top.
content.location: Leftmost route on the west face of the Solo boulder. If you can locate the boulder problem Zanzibar, continue east to a jumble of boulders. You can scramble up through a chimney from beneath to get to the top of  acid boulder where you can belay from.

content.protection: 4 bolts. Two bolts (no chains) up top.
content.location: On the parking lot side of Solo Boulder. On the left. Also, on theface of the border to the left of Road to Nowhere.

content.description: The largest boulder in the Kingdom.   It is visible from the parking lot
